verses.verse: My little children, I am writing these things to you so that you might not sin. And if anyone sins, we have an Encourager close to the Father, Jesus, the Anointed King, who does what is right.
And He is a remedy concerning our sins, not concerning ours only, but also concerning the whole world's.
And in this we know that we have known Him, if we keep His demands.
The person saying, "I have known Him," and not keeping His demands is a liar, and the truth is not in this.
But whoever keeps His message, truly in this, the love of God has been completed. In this, we know that we are in Him.
The person saying to be staying in Him is obligated, just as that One Himself also traipsed around, so to be traipsing around.
Brothers, I am not writing a new demand to you, but a former demand that you were having from the beginning. The demand, the former one, is the message that you heard from the beginning.
Again I am writing a new demand to you, that is truthful in Him and in you, because the darkness is passing on by and the light, the true light, is already shining.
The person saying to be in the light and hating his brother is in the dark until now.
The person loving his brother stays in the light, and there is no obstacle in him.
But the person hating his brother is in the dark, traipses around in the dark, and does not realize where he is going back to because the dark blinded his eyes.
I am writing to you, little children, because the sins have been forgiven you because of His name.

I am writing to you, fathers, because you have known the One who is from the beginning. I am writing to you, young lads, because you have conquered the evil one. I am writing to you, young children, because you have known the Father.

I wrote to you, fathers, because you have known the One who is from the beginning. I wrote to you, young lads, because you are strong, the message of God stays in you, and you have conquered the evil one.
Don't love the world, neither the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him
because everything in the world (the desire of the physical body, the desire of the eyes, and the ego of the life) is not from the Father, but is from the world.
And the world passes on by and its desire. But the person doing what God wants stays for the span of time.

Young children, it is a last hour. And just as you heard that the Opponent to the Anointed King is coming, and now many have become opponents to the Anointed King, from this we know that it is a last hour.
From us they went out, but they were not from us. You see, if they were from us, they would have stayed with us. But this happened so that they might be shown, because not all are from us.
And you have an anointing out from the Sacred One, and you realize all things.
I didn't write to you because you don't realize the truth, but because you realize it and that every lie is not from the truth.
Who is the liar if it is not the one denying that Jesus is the Anointed King? This one is the opponent to the Anointed King, the one who denies the Father and the Son.
Everyone denying the Son does not have the Father either. The person acknowledging the Son also has the Father.
So as for you, what you heard from the beginning must stay in you. If it stays in you (what you heard from the beginning), you also will stay in the Son and in the Father.
And this is the promise that He promised us, the life, the life that spans all time.
I wrote these things to you about the people misleading you.

And as for you, the anointing that you received out from Him stays in you, and you have no need that someone should teach you, but as the same anointing teaches you about all things, is truthful, and is not a lie, and just as He taught you, you will stay in Him.
And now, little children, stay in Him so that when He is shown, we may have an openness and not be shamed away from Him during His arrival.
If you realize that He is right, you know that everyone doing things the right way has been born from Him.
